QuestData.Title: Reading the Leaves
QuestData.Description: $n, my friend. You must succeed where I have failed. You must find our dear Malfurion.$b$bAs the Nightmare consumes my thoughts, I hear the voices of these twisted trees. I must cling to sanity long enough to aid you.$b$bVenture into Ash'theran and bring me Corrupted Petals from the fallen denizens there.$b$bWith them, I might find your Archdruid while my mind is still my own.
QuestData.CompletionText: Ahh... the fear! The panic!$b$bI haven't the strength to fight much longer...
QuestData.RewardText: The waking world is slipping further and further from my mind. But on the vestiges of this corruption consuming my mind, I sense Malfurion!
